name: Thundering Penance
title: Keqing: Thundering Penance
desc: As long as you're not actually cheating, this is just the name of a card.
inPlayDescription: When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Elemental Infusion, it will have the following effects:Starting <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Duration (Rounds) +1, <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG dealt by the attached character +1.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Keqing to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Keqing, equip this card.After Keqing equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Stellar Restoration once.When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Elemental Infusion, it will have the following effects:Starting <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Duration (Rounds) +1, <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG dealt by the attached character +1.(You must have Keqing in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
